channel.title: Making it so when you click too fast on a player, it disconnects you
channel.description:
Making it so when you click too fast on a player, it disconnects you. This was on my wish list forever, please help :)
-Parkview
if you know where the tut is, post the link because i didn't find ANYTHING.

item.title: Making it so when you click too fast on a player, it disconnects you
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

- Rule 3: If you've read the rules correctly you would of noticed that the forum does not agree with slang language. I would recommend that you use full english. You could be warned.

Your right, i have read this rule before, i was just late for the bus to go to school. I had to rush, sorry about that. I will edit, but lets not get off topic and help me answer the question.

-THANK- you : ;D

item.title: Making it so when you click too fast on a player, it disconnects you
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

I’m don’t think this would help but,
If you open up Client Java,
Hold Ctrl and F,
Then try and find a kind of hit counter,
Then create a void that if the hit counter goes so high, it disconnects you.
